statements: SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_link FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT material_name, upload_date FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Document' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type, material_link, upload_date FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC, material_type DESC
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_link FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY upload_date DESC
SELECT material_name, upload_date FROM training_materials WHERE material_type IS NOT NULL AND material_link IS NOT NULL ORDER BY upload_date
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_link FROM training_materials WHERE material_type IS NULL AND material_link LIKE '%pdf%' ORDER BY material_name
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type, material_link, upload_date FROM training_materials WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date DESC
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, author_name FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id > 3 ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_skills WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE upload_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_skills WHERE skill_level = 'Advanced' ORDER BY skill_name ASC;
SELECT author_name, material_description FROM training_materials JOIN team_skills ON training_materials.material_id = team_skills.required_material_id;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%SQL%' AND material_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT title, description FROM training_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, role FROM team_members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_access WHERE access_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_id, material_id FROM resource_access WHERE member_id = 2 AND material_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM training_materials WHERE id = 2;
SELECT title, description, link FROM training_materials ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM resource_access WHERE access_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, description FROM training_materials WHERE uploaded_by = 'Alice';
SELECT session_name, trainer_name, session_date FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE position = 'Engineer' AND team_lead = TRUE;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM session_feedback WHERE session_id = 'e4b00d30-74c2-4a8f-8c4c-a426aef250e7';
SELECT * FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, description FROM training_materials WHERE uploaded_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE team_lead = TRUE ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT session_name, trainer_name, session_date FROM training_sessions WHERE duration > '1 hour';
SELECT feedback_id, session_id, attendee_id, rating FROM session_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT material_name, uploaded_by FROM training_materials ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_categories WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY uploaded_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT material_name, material_type, uploaded_by FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Document' ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT t.material_name, c.category_name FROM training_materials t JOIN training_categories c ON t.material_id = c.category_id ORDER BY t.material_name, c.category_name;
SELECT m.member_name, s.skill_name, s.skill_level FROM team_members m JOIN member_skills s ON m.member_id = s.member_id WHERE s.skill_level > 3 ORDER BY m.member_name, s.skill_name;

SELECT a.assessment_id, m.member_name, sa.skill_name, sa.assessment_date FROM skill_assessment sa JOIN team_members m ON sa.member_id = m.member_id JOIN member_skills ms ON sa.member_id = ms.member_id WHERE sa.assessment_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY sa.assessment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
